ovdesc.p: This screen is used to store different regions within a country.A region can be used to differentiate between the holidays applicable for different regions within a country. A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or delete a record in store table, PPT.REGION.

desc.p: Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of fields, 'RAC' and 'RSC'
This field can hold upto 1 alphanumeric character and the value is not editable by the user.
Indicates the country code of the country for which a region is defined.
